mapper.insert: insert into Book (book_id, title, ISBN, publisher_id, pub_date, price, author, pages, size, genre_id) values (#{bookId}, #{title}, #{ISBN}, #{publisherId}, #{pubDate}, #{price}, #{author}, #{page}, #{size}, #{genreId});
mapper.select: select b.* , p.name from Book b join publisher p on b.publisher_id = p.publisher_id order by book_id
